bug.author: laurentromary
bug.summary: Wrong order of teiHeader component in TEI output
bug.description: The current TEI output (as provided by <denchmark-link:http://cloud.science-miner.com/grobid/>http://cloud.science-miner.com/grobid/</denchmark-link> ; TEI/Process Fulltext Document) inserts encodingDesc as first element of the teiHeader. It should be placed after fileDesc, which is a mandatory first component of the TEI header.
